content: विष्कंभः {@--1@} Obstacle, hindrance, impediment. {@--2@} The bolt or bar of a door. {@--3@} The supporting beam of a house. {@--4@} A post, pillar. {@--5@} A tree. {@--6@} (In dramas) An interlude between the acts of a drama and performed by one or more characters, middling or inferior, who connect the story of the drama and the subdivisions of the plot by briefly explaining to the audience what has occurred in the intervals of the acts or what is likely to happen later on:--<ls>S. D.</ls> thus defines it: --वृत्तवर्तिष्यमाणानां कथांशानां निदर्शकः . संक्षिप्तार्थस्तु विष्कंभ आदावंकस्य दर्शितः . मध्येन मध्यमाभ्यां वा पात्राभ्यां संप्रयोजितः . शुद्धः स्यात् स तु संकीर्णो नीचमध्यमकल्पितः <ls n="S. D.">308.</ls> {@--7@} The diameter of a circle. {@--8@} A particular posture practised by Yogins. {@--9@} Extension, length. {@--10@} The first of the twenty-seven astronomical periods (योग).
